name: Slot Car Race Track Set, 19ft Electric Track with LED Lights and 4 Slot Cars, 2 Hand Controllers and Racing Game Lap Counters, Set Features Loop, Turns, and Crossover for Boys Age 6-12
short_description: Precautions：Please snap the tracks tight together and ensure they are secured to each other. Otherwise, they will easily separate in use.

【Electric Track with LED Lights】On the more than 19ft long track, our slot cars run insanely fast, up to the top speed of a real racing car in real life. The two 360° loops are equipped with LED lights, giving players a cooler racing experience. Just turn off the lights in the room and enjoy the fun in the immersive racing game.

【4 Slot Cars with Lights】Feel the power and the speed of the 1:43 scale cars racing on the track at the speed up to about 300-380 mph! The headlights of the four slot cars will all light up while driving. Dim the light in the room and watch the car lights "shoot" away as the car goes. Note: The circular tracks do not support 4 cars running simultaneously.

【3 Ways or DIY to Assemble】The parts of this new design are super sturdy, durable, and easy to put together. The slot cars take skill to keep on the track. The complete slot car set includes charging cable, 45 connection tracks, 2 speed controllers, 4 high-speed slot cars with LED lights, 2 lap counters, straights, curves, supports, 2 loops with LED lights, guardrails.

【Automatic Lap Counter】With two lap counters for both racing cars, such that two players can keep track of their laps and compete with each other, which strengthens the feeling of competition and excitement and adds more fun to the game.

【Power Adapter Mode】Our electric track set includes a power adapter. Powering it with the power adapter makes the car run more stably. Players then have fun for as long as they'd like to and extend the life of the track.

【2 Speed Controllers】Invite two players to start the race! Each player will have a controller. From slow to fast, you'll need to figure out which sections of the track to decelerate and which ones to accelerate on. Find a way to win the race - it's a showdown between experts!

【Advanced Version】This is an advanced version of a racing game, suitable for children with some experience (aged 6-12). You'll need to master the controller skills to prevent the slot car from going off track. If you're looking for a beginner-level （aged 4-8）slot car racing track set, consider checking out another model from the pafolo brand.

【Perfect Gift】It is a good choice toy gifts for kids on Christmas, Thanksgiving Day, New Year, etc. It's also be a great race car toys for kids 6+ years old. If you have any questions about the product, please feel free to contact us.

name: Carrera GO Electric Powered Slot Car Racing Kids Toy Race Track Set 1:43 Scale, Street Legends
short_description: Fast-paced racing action on over 16-feet of track with realistic cars that reach scale speeds of 370-mph
Set features long straightaways, exciting loop, and curves giving you thrilling action all over the track
1:43 scale slot car racing is an exciting two-player and group activity that friends and family can enjoy racing head-to-head together
Customize and expand your track with the use of expansion sets, accessories, and a wide selection of additional cars to create challenging new races
Everything you need in the box to start racing including cars, speed controllers, and track layout shown. Dimensions when assembled-5.18 x 2.23 feet
product_description: Start your engines and get ready to experience the thrill of slot car racing with the Carrera GO!!! Street Legends Slot Car Racetrack! Slot car racing brings to you the look, feel, and excitement of real race car driving but with you in control behind the wheel! Soon enough your heart will be beating fast as you speed down the straightaways or drift around a tight curve to squeeze into 1st place and claim the checkered flag before your competition! All this action can be had in the comfort of your own home. The Carrera GO!!! Street Legends slot car track sets the stage for a speedy showdown between a 1967 Ford Mustang and Chevrolet Camaro. With these two popular race cars, you as the driver holds the key to who gets the checkered flag in this thrilling head-to-head race! Race on a course that stretches over 16-feet and features a loop, straightaways, curves, and flyover that will provide exciting action all over the track. Only the driver with the best skills can master the track and claim victory in the end! Hours of action and fun are guaranteed. With a variety of available accessories, track expansion sets, and a wide selection of additional cars, this complete slot car track system can be expanded and modified for endless possibilities and more awesome racing. The complete slot car set includes a transformer, connection track, 2 speed controllers, 2 1:43 scale cars, lap counter, straights, curves, loop, and flyover. The two cars included with this set are Ford Mustang '67 Stars 'n Stripes and Chevrolet Camaro Stars 'n Stripes.
